monster.name: Statue of Talos
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The statue makes five attacks: one with its headbutt and four with its lightning bolt blades.

action.name: Headbutt
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Bolt Blades
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Sting
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

monster.name: Tooth-N-Claw
monster.languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

action.name: Freezing Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Tooth-N-Claw exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
